sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> is stuck in a <radical>prison</radical> under the <radical>ground</radical> and it's starting to <kanji>rot</kanji> and <kanji>decay</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Trees can't live without sunlight, and it's too damp underground in a prison. The water gets all moldy and the tree will rot and die.
readingMnemonic: You get close to the <kanji>rot</kanji>ting tree and see some rotten <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (<ja>きゅう</ja>) hanging from its branches. No!
readingInfo: This poor cucumber tree, left in this ground prison to rot. There's nothing worse than eating a rotten cucumber.
